price: 28.cagalah moominiiney Yalli sin maaluuy sin xaylo mokkoroh siinih yeceem ixiga, diggah Yalli isi amri oggole marah kaxxa galtó-le Akeeral.
arabic: وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَآ أَمۡوَٰلُكُمۡ وَأَوۡلَٰدُكُمۡ فِتۡنَةٞ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجۡرٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-iʿ'lamū annamā amwālukum wa-awlādukum fit'natun wa-anna al-laha ʿindahu ajrun ʿaẓīmun
